nodes.text: The Bith Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Tenebrous, better known as Rugess Nome, owned an estate during his tenure as Sith Master. After his death at the hands of his apprentice Darth Plagueis on Bal'demnic in 67 BBY, the estate would remain empty.

When Plagueis returned from Bal'demnic to Muunilinst some days later, he stated to Larsh Hill that the estate would be pass into their hands, though he stated it would not have been for some time as it was unlikely that Tenebrous's body would ever be found. He also said the estate would be liquidated, though there were several items he wished to retain. Plagueis said that he would compile a list of those items.
